Title: If I Want to Whistle, I Whistle
Writer: Cãtãlin Mitulescu, Florin Serban, Andreea Valean (play)
Actors: George Pistereanu, Ada Condeescu, Mihai Constantin, Clara Voda
Plot: Silviu, a young man who has spent years in a youth penitentiary, is granted release. Before he can leave, his mother returns to Romania to bring his little brother to Italy with her, despite Silviu's objections. He meets a young woman, Ana, who is working on a research project in the prison, and becomes interested in her. In his desperation Silviu resorts to violence, and Ana becomes his hostage.
